promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a massive rare ibex grass-type wearing a ornate crown. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or grass. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crowner, a massive rare ibex grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: snap-trap, leafage. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word ibex or grass or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, ibex-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Crowner lives in lush meadows, its snap-trap capturing unsuspecting prey. Its leafage soaks up sun and wind, helping it traverse its kingdom.
